first_para: Charles Hendry (born 6 May 1959 in Cuckfield, Sussex) is a British Conservative Party politician. In May 2010 he was appointed Minister of State for the Department of Energy and Climate Change and served until 2012.

full.extract: Charles Hendry (born 6 May 1959 in Cuckfield, Sussex) is a British Conservative Party politician. In May 2010 he was appointed Minister of State for the Department of Energy and Climate Change and served until 2012.
full.title: Charles Hendry
